[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-logger/src/filter.rs] [Function: Directive::from_str()] [Whitespace handling] Does str::trim at line 169 handle all unicode whitespace characters correctly, or could zero-width characters or other unicode tricks bypass filtering restrictions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-logger/src/filter.rs] [Function: Builder::directives] [Unbounded growth] Does the directives Vec at line 59 have any capacity limits, or could repeated calls to parse() with large input strings cause unbounded memory growth leading to validator OOM? (High)
